casebody.data:
No. 10-8049. Gerald Alexander Melton, Petitioner v. Edwin G. Buss, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections, et al. 562 U.S. 1233, 131 S. Ct. 1503,

179 L. Ed. 2d 329,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1562. February 22, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
